channel.title: DBRAND reveals Half-Life 3 with slick burn
channel.description:
[img]https://cdn.slashgear.com/wp-content/uploads/2016/06/sick.jpg[/img]
This morning the folks at dbrand have revealed their collaboration with OnePlus smartphones with a Half-Life 3 teaser.
[url]https://www.slashgear.com/dbrand-reveals-half-life-3-oneplus-3-with-slick-burn-07443159/[/url]

item.title: DBRAND reveals Half-Life 3 with slick burn
item.dc:creator: RedEye
item.description:
It’s obvious, hl3 is only going to be a mobile platform game. I thought that was common knowledge.
